page.title: 02General features (cont)
page.content: South Wales. The main road through the area is known as{'The Coast Road'} (A403) which links the docks at Avonmouth to the south with the motorway network at Aust and the Severn Bridge.(M4) There is also a mainline railway line running through the area, entering the {Severn Tunnel}at Pilning and running through to Sudbrook and the Severn Tunnel Junction on the Welsh side of the estuary. From the coast you can see clearly the Welsh coast only about 3 km. away. {Severn Beach}is a seaside resort, though the beach is small and the water muddy. It has four camping and caravan sites. In some they have {permanent caravans}where people have made their homes, while others are for touring caravans. Most of the houses in the area are owner-occupied but
